title: Cookie preferences - Find a court or tribunal - GOV.UK
p1: Cookies are files saved on your phone, tablet or computer when you visit a website. Most websites need cookies to work properly.
bullets: measure how you use the service so it can be improved
h2: How cookies are used in this service
caption: Cookie details
name: Name
language: Your language selection: English or Welsh
p3: We use Google Analytics software to collect information about how you use this service. We do this to help make sure the service is meeting the needs of its users and to help us make improvements. We do not allow Google to use or share the data about how you use this site.
additionalCookies: Government services may set additional cookies and, if so, will have their own cookie policy and banner.
gaDescription: A randomly generated reference used to identify unique users and inform referring sites, visitor and session counts
